alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 16 at 8:20AM EST until January 16 at 8:45AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Hendry County in southern Florida... Southwestern Glades County in southern Florida... * Until 845 AM EST. * At 820 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Charleston Park, or near Lehigh Acres, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Labelle and Muse around 835 AM EST. Port La Belle around 845 AM EST. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
